original_text: And the porch before the temple of the house, twenty cubits was the length thereof, according to the breadth of the house; and ten cubits was the breadth thereof before the house.
korean_text: 성전의 성소 앞 주랑의 길이는 성전의 너비와 같이 이십 규빗이요 그 너비는 성전 앞에서부터 십 규빗이며

sentences.original_text: And the porch before the temple of the house
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 집의 성전 앞에 있는 현관은

sentences.original_text: twenty cubits was the length thereof
according to the breadth of the house
and ten cubits was the breadth thereof before the house
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 집 앞에서 그 너비는 십 규빗이었더라
